weed.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a wild plant growing where it is not wanted that prevents crops or garden flowers from growing properly
weed.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a plant without flowers that grows on water in a large green floating mass
weed.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Nigel’s such a weed, isn’t he?
weed.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to remove unwanted plants from a garden or other place
